entry.title: FLYBIRD Foldable Flat Weight Bench
entry.s:type: Sporting Goods > Exercise & Fitness > Exercise Benches > Adjustable Bench > Weight Bench > Foldable Incline & Decline Bench
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flybird Fitness
Type: Sporting Goods > Exercise & Fitness > Exercise Benches > Adjustable Bench > Weight Bench > Foldable Incline & Decline Bench
Price: 119.99



AMERICA’S BEST UTILITY FOLDABLE BENCH

FLYBIRD, which is design and produce fitness equipment for 20 years. Especially in WEIGHT BENCH, the bench was designed with advice of professional coach. You need a durable bench, Not a one month bench. 

Non-slip End Caps

4 non-slip plastic caps can prevent movement during the workout. You can stand assured the weight bench will remain steady. And the cap can be rotated and adjusted if the floor is not level. It can protect your floor as well.

 No assembly & folding storage

No mounting screws required, no wobbling and lost and other installation problems. Almost out of the box, very convenient. FLYBIRD Flat bench is designed for perfect space-saving. Easy to fold and store under the bed or in the closet. Perfect for small spaces and home gyms.


 Commercial Quality Steel

FLYBIRD Flat bench with T-shaped structure and heavy-duty steel tube frame create an ultra-high-strength main body. This Flat Bench pass thousands of pressure tests to make sure it's safe and durable to support more than 650LBS. 

 Wear Resistant Leather

FLYBIRD Flat Bench's padded with high-density foam which can reduce your muscle fatigue during workout, makes your workouts more comfortable. The PU texture fabric gives the bench a water proof, anti-skid feature and does not wrinkle easily after many uses. And you can easily clean it.

 Multifunctional Home Gym Equipment

Popular for full-body workouts like dumbbell presses, chest presses, triceps bench dips etc. Great for using with MENCIRO squat rack or weights.

 


【No Worry Buying】

For all FLYBIRD Bench, the measurement and capacity is actual result, NOT as others mendacious Bench. Order today and get a 1 year cover on the frame, 30 days cover on the pads.

 

Product Specification

  • Weight Limit: 650 Pounds
  • ASSEMBLY: NO ASSEMBLY NEEDED
  • Product Dimensions: 45.67 inch L x 12.4 inch W x 7.48 inch H
  • Product Weight: 20.5 Pounds

entry.title: Flybird Doorway Pull Up Bar (Blue)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flybird Fitness
Type:
Price: 54.99

  • Customer Satisfaction is Our First Priority: If you are unsatisfied in any way with this product, we will refund your money or give you a replacement, no question asked. Kindly remind that please measure the size of your own door frame before purchase!
  • NO Mark On Your Door: Passing the patent application unique rhombus structure guarantees your security. Soft anti-skid PVC mats on both side to protect the frame from cracking and prevent the damage caused by sudden falling off. The more weight the doorway chin up bars withstand, the more sturdy it is.
  • NO Screws And NO Drilling: You only take minutes to set it up and remove it on the door frame. Just rotate the pole to press against the door frame. Pay attention to DO NOT use the pull up bar doorway on glass door, hollowed door or other fragile door frame.
  • Sturdy Locking Mechanism: Made of stainless steel, will prevent the pull up bar from rotating during use, which make sure the security for yourself. Never worry over-tighten the pull-up bar and do BAD damage to your door frame.
  • Adjustable Pull Up Bars: Customize length for an easy fit in most door frame between 28.3"- 36.2"(72cm-92cm). Suitable for standard doorway, perfect for home, garage or office use. Max. Support: 200kg/440lbs.
  • Private Home Gym: Flybird pull-up bars are perfect for pull-ups, chin-ups, sit-ups, dips, crunches, triceps dips, leg raises and more. Easy to carry it and hassle-free to install. No need go to gym to waste your time, just start your workout at home or office any time!

entry.title: Bundle: Set Of Dumbbells 55 Lbs & Weight Bench FB149
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flybird Fitness
Type:
Price: 499.99


Multi-fuction And Ajustable

Whether you’re a beginner or an expert in the gym, this bundle has everything you need to reach your fitness goals. With dumbbells that have 5 different weight settings and a versatile, steel bench with 10 settings, you can work out any muscle group. The stability of the steel bench and foot grips, combined with the powerful dumbbells, allows your workouts to reach new heights. You can trust that you’ll be fully supported by our Flybird Weights Adjustable Weight Bench up to 700 pounds, whether you are in a declined, flat, or inclined position. This duo makes sure you can always have powerhouse workouts.

  • Dumbbells adjust from 11 - 55 lbs
  • Adjusts in intervals of 11 lbs
  • Replaces 10 individual dumbbells
  • 7 back positions & 3 seat positions
  • Fit for up to 10 different exercises.

Stability And Strength Combined

With this incredible bundle, the exercises you can perform are endless. Adjust your weights and bench angles to work any muscle group effectively. Quickly transition through workouts with an easy and seamless adjustment process. You’ll also save a huge amount of space in your house with these powerful dumbbells that replace 5 sets of weights. Better yet, the Flybird Weights Adjustable Weight Bench is easy to fold and allows for stress-free storage.

  • Dmbbells just turn the handle with one hand
  • Save 80% Space
  • The ideal bundle for working out any part of the body
  • Bench easily folds for optimal storage
  • Best Choice For People up to 6'2"

FLYBIRD Weight Bench

FLYBIRD has designed & produced fitness equipment for more than 20 years, especially known for Weight Bench. Designed with the advice of professional coaches, FLYBIRD bench is loved & trusted by lots of customers. We are keep moving forward and aiming to produce the best adjustable weight bench for your home gym.


Product Description

Distinctive Waist Pad

Unique Waist Cushion with 2" soft foam padding and vegan leather is more ergonomic and comfortable. The cambered Waist Pad helps reduce the pressure on the lumbar spine.

Stable Workout Bench

Heavy-Duty Commercial Quality Steel with advanced frosted texture & Triangular Structure ensure the high stability of FLYBIRD Weight Bench. Fast Adjustment for Full Body Workout.

Adjustable Foot Support

Extended foot pad with three adjustable positions is suitable for different people. Full foam protects your feet and is more comfortable. Non-slip Foot Caps increase stability.

Save 70% Space

FLYBIRD foldable weight bench is ready to use out of the box & easy to store and carry. You can put it in the corner or under the bed when you finish workout.

 

  • High Quality For Your Home Gym:Heavy-Duty Commercial Quality Frosted Steel & Stable Triangular Structure bring you a real experience of GYM. Thousands of weight tests ensure it's sturdy and durable to support more than 650LBS.
  • 96% Pre-Installed & Foldable To Store:No Screws needed to be installed and insert 3 pins to start your exercise. Easy to fold, store and carry. You can put it in the corner or under the bed when it's not needed.
  • Best Choice For People up to 5'9":16.5in Standard Height & 45in length is the best choice for the people up to 5'9". FLYBIRD develops different weight benches for all people. Click our store [FLYBIRD Fitness].
  • No Worry Buying From FLYBIRD Fitness:FLYBIRD Fitness attach great importance to the Quality and Customer Experience. Order today and get a 1-Year Cover on the Frame & a 30-Day Cover on the Pads.

Product Features

 High Quality Bench

There's nothing more important when getting fit than investing in a reliable weight bench. We built the FB139 to meet the highest standards in stability, adjustability, and durability. If you're demanding results, FB139 is right for you.

Unique Triangle Structure

﻿Give your workouts a makeover! Unique triangle-shaped design perfect for abs, back, chest and arms. Heavy-duty support with 600lbs weight capacity.

 Full Body Workout

Designed with 6 back positions & 4 seat positions for Full Body Workout, you just pull support bar, adjust to the place which fit yourself and all is done!
